game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find and recover the lost artifact.
game.description: In a forgotten temple deep in the jungle, an ancient treasure waits to be discovered. Unravel the mysteries to claim your reward.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical item.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the temple.
task.description: You've been given an ancient map to guide you. Follow it to find the hidden entrance.
task.location: Jungle clearing, southwest of the village.

task.objective: Solve the puzzle at the temple's threshold.
task.description: A series of runes must be lit in the correct order to unlock the entrance. Study them carefully.
